mmAbduct00000000.name: Rapimento
mmAbduct00000000.description: Il [[lookup @name lowercase]] non deve spendere movimento aggiuntivo per spostare una creatura che sta afferrando.

mmAberrantGround.name: Aberrant Ground
mmAberrantGround.description: The ground in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zVznqPXgYjETqpQz]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name]] is &Reference[Difficult Terrain].

mmAcidAbsorption.name: Acid Absorption
mmAcidAbsorption.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to &Reference[Acid] damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Acid damage dealt.

mmAcidBreath0000.name: Acid Breath
mmAcidBreath0000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=qNI6W02jCUQbPpYE]]-foot-wide Line.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmAcidSpray00000.name: Acid Spray
mmAcidSpray00000.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]-wide [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

mmAdhesive000000.name: Adhesive (Object Form Only)
mmAdhesive000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adheres to anything that touches it. A Huge or smaller creature adhered to the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Ability checks made to escape this grapple have Disadvantage.

mmAgile000000000.name: Agile
mmAgile000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't provoke an &Reference[opportunityattacks]{Opportunity Attack} when it moves out of an enemy's reach.

mmAirForm0000000.name: Air Form
mmAirForm0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmAmorphous00000.name: Amorphous
mmAmorphous00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmAmphibious0000.name: Amphibious
mmAmphibious0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water.

mmAnimateTrees00.name: Animate Trees
mmAnimateTrees00.description: The [[lookup @name]] magically animates up to two trees it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=EceTNjzjKWdrMNAy]] feet of itself. Each tree uses the Treant stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, it can't speak, and it lacks this action. The tree takes its turn immediately after the treant on the same initiative count, and it obeys the treant. A tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, the treant dies, or it is more than 120 feet from the treant. The tree then takes root if possible.

mmAntennae000000.name: Antennae
mmAntennae000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] object—armor or a weapon—worn or carried by a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]] feet of itself. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcSC7EuknnM0uoqY]], the creature with the object. Failure: The object takes a -1 penalty to the AC it offers (armor) or to its attack rolls (weapon). Armor is destroyed if the penalty reduces its AC to 10, and a weapon is destroyed if its penalty reaches -5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000] spell on the armor or weapon.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides a Damaged Enchantment effect that will modify the targeted object. Due to the fact that the equipment penalty can be applied multiple times, the enchantment needs to be dragged from this item's Effects tab onto the target Item's sheet.

mmAquaticCharge0.name: Aquatic Charge
mmAquaticCharge0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] swims up to its Swim Speed straight toward an enemy it can see.

mmArcaneProwl000.name: Arcane Prowl
mmArcaneProwl000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can teleport up to [[lookup @range.value activity=a3RqyzU0UqzLJif0]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and it makes one [[/item Claw]] attack.

mmAttach00000000.name: Attach
mmAttach00000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to it. While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is attached, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't make Bite attacks against other targets. In addition, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by spending 5 feet of movement. The target or a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] feet of it can take an action to try to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]], doing so by succeeding on a DC [[lookup @check.dc.value activity=6iLqAufAeEqDOlGs]] Strength (Athletics) check.

mmAuraOfAuthorit.name: Aura of Authority
mmAuraOfAuthorit.description: While in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dE4lg9tZyXtoCb5x]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its allies have Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws, provided the [[lookup @name lowercase]] doesn't have the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition.

mmAversionToFire.name: Aversion to Fire
mmAversionToFire.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes Fire damage, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of its next turn.

mmBalefulCommand.name: Baleful Command
mmBalefulCommand.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=SzU2lwdbqgoFMuBM]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] and &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] conditions until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmBanish00000000.name: Banish
mmBanish00000000.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and is transported to a harmless demiplane until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, at which point it re­appears in an unoccupied space of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s choice within [[lookup @range.value activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again [[lookup @duration.special activity=kWKwiAYgyeKBLMNJ]].

mmBarbedHide0000.name: Barbed Hide
mmBarbedHide0000.description: At the start of each of its turns, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals [[/damage average]] damage to any creature [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=1O5eyc72vPW0UxYZ]].

mmBeaks000000000.name: Beaks
mmBeaks000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]] if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=3m1SLqBeMGQF3UaQ]]

mmBeard000000000.name: Beard
mmBeard000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Until this poison ends, the target can't regain Hit Points.

mmBeastOfBurden0.name: Beast of Burden
mmBeastOfBurden0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] counts as one size larger for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

mmBeguile0000000.name: Beguile
mmBeguile0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmBerserk0000000.name: Berserk
mmBerserk0000000.description:
Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts its turn &Reference[Bloodied], roll [[/r 1d6]]. On a 6, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk. On each of its turns while berserk, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks the nearest creature it can see. If no creature is near enough to move to and attack, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attacks an object. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] goes berserk, it remains so until it is destroyed or it is no longer Bloodied.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s creator, if within [[lookup @range.value activity=tnkOsrSwEElO2kZM]] feet of the berserk [[lookup @name lowercase]], can try to calm it by taking an action to make a [[/check ability=cha skill=per dc=@abilities.str.dc]] DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check; the golem must be able to hear its creator. If this check succeeds, the golem ceases being berserk until the start of its next turn, at which point it resumes rolling for the Berserk trait again if it is still Bloodied.

mmBites000000000.name: Bites
mmBites000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], or [[/damage average activity=3Yo83eZUNwX51AcE]] if [[lookup @activation.condition activity=3Yo83eZUNwX51AcE]]

mmBlazingLight00.name: Blazing Light
mmBlazingLight00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast [[/item Scorching Ray]]

mmBlindingBreath.name: Blinding Breath
mmBlindingBreath.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=soAO2jRWos8FsxeU]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=soAO2jRWos8FsxeU]]-foot Cone. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmBlindingGaze00.name: Blinding Gaze
mmBlindingGaze00.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=B6xM8C2pABIb5o7y]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=B6xM8C2pABIb5o7y]] feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition for 1 minute. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmBlindingSpittl.name: Blinding Spittle
mmBlindingSpittl.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point within [[lookup @range.value activity=JfU8KFZkAJxWtrhk]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmBloodFrenzy000.name: Blood Frenzy
mmBloodFrenzy000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its Hit Points.

mmBloodiedFrenzy.name: Bloodied Frenzy
mmBloodiedFrenzy.description: While &Reference[Bloodied], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls and saving throws.

mmBloodiedFury00.name: Bloodied Fury
mmBloodiedFury00.description: While &Reference[Bloodied], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on attack rolls.

mmBlurredForm000.name: Blurred Form
mmBlurredForm000.description: Attack rolls against the [[lookup @name lowercase]] are made with Disadvantage unless the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

mmBoulder0000000.name: Boulder
mmBoulder0000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

mmBoulderToss000.name: Boulder Toss
mmBoulderToss000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] hurls a boulder at a point it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=jpC3fk7LJlhH4CDr]] feet.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=jpC3fk7LJlhH4CDr]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=jpC3fk7LJlhH4CDr]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on that point.

Failure: [[/damage average]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone] condition.

Success: Half damage only.

mmBound000000000.name: Bound
mmBound000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is magically bound to an amulet. While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its amulet are on the same plane of existence, the amulet's wearer can telepathically call the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to travel to it, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the distance and direction to the amulet. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is within 60 feet of the amulet's wearer, half of any damage the wearer takes (round up) is transferred to the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmBubbleDash0000.name: Bubble Dash
mmBubbleDash0000.description: While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Swim Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks].

mmBurn0000000000.name: Burn
mmBurn0000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it starts &Reference[burning].

mmBurstofIngenui.name: Burst of Ingenuity
mmBurstofIngenui.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name]] or another creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=AyYipNx3cFaXA0LU]] feet makes an ability check or a saving throw. Response: The sphinx adds 2 to the roll.

mmCacophony00000.name: Cacophony
mmCacophony00000.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=pyvvXqoxJsjkkP38]], one creature in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Deafened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While Deafened, the target also has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

mmCaptainsCharm0.name: Captain's Charm
mmCaptainsCharm0.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=3o27u4Ww7SmCgc8k]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=3o27u4Ww7SmCgc8k]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmCelestialResto.name: Celestial Restoration
mmCelestialResto.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, it returns to life in [[/r 1d6#Days]] days and regains all its Hit Points unless @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelEvil] is cast on its remains.

mmChain000000000.name: Chain
mmChain000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two chains, and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmCharge00000000.name: Charge
mmCharge00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to [[lookup @range.special activity=Y2IncZu5BjB42z7l]] straight toward an enemy it can see.

mmChargedTendril.name: Charged Tendril
mmChargedTendril.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls the target 5 feet straight toward itself.

mmChargingHorn00.name: Charging Horn
mmChargingHorn00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed without provoking &Reference[Opportunity Attacks], and it makes one [[/item Radiant Horn]] attack.

mmCharm000000000.name: Charm
mmCharm000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCharmPerso], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]), and the duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=fcRXSTOlFJShCl52]] hours. The &Reference[Charmed apply=false] target is a willing recipient of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s [[/item Bite]], the damage of which doesn't end the spell. When the spell ends, the target is unaware it was Charmed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmChill000000000.name: Chill
mmChill000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHoldMonste]. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmClaws000000000.name: Claws
mmClaws000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmCloakedFlight0.name: Cloaked Flight
mmCloakedFlight0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili] on itself, and it can fly up to half its Fly Speed. The dragon can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmCloudOfInsects.name: Cloud of Insects
mmCloudOfInsects.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=0OkFhjOM80ipoNKy]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=0OkFhjOM80ipoNKy]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has Disadvantage on saving throws to maintain &Reference[Concentration] until the end of its next turn.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmColdBreath0000.name: Cold Breath
mmColdBreath0000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=8P7hmd3Nron4RAIv]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmColdGale000000.name: Cold Gale
mmColdGale000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=pVs8BTVDNh54CZ0a]]-foot-wide Line.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to 30 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Success: Half damage only.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmCommandingPres.name: Commanding Presence
mmCommandingPres.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command} (level 2 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmCompression000.name: Compression
mmCompression000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmConferFireResi.name: Confer Fire Resistance
mmConferFireResi.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grant Resistance to Fire damage to a rider while it is on the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmConjureInferna.name: Conjure Infernal Chain
mmConjureInferna.description:
The devil conjures a fiery chain to bind a creature.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=9vCVJrzUZL0ra4w2]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn, at which point the chain disappears. If the target is Large or smaller, the devil moves the target up to 30 feet straight toward itself.

Success: The chain disappears.

mmConstrict00000.name: Constrict
mmConstrict00000.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=IgOMjRxAt7UISkJq]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]), and it has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

mmConsumeLife000.name: Consume Life
mmConsumeLife000.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1Hy8CdhpwQlLxDPq]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=1Hy8CdhpwQlLxDPq]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=1Hy8CdhpwQlLxDPq]] feet. that has 0 Hit Points. Failure: The target dies, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[/healing average activity=1waYTjY3NAIGZgrI]].

mmConsumeMemorie.name: Consume Memories
mmConsumeMemorie.description: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]] feet. [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=uI3HDQ1grN123Or3]] damage. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] gains the target's memories if the target is a Humanoid and is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this action.

mmCorrosiveForm0.name: Corrosive Form
mmCorrosiveForm0.description:
A creature that hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]] with a melee attack roll takes [[/damage average]] damage. Nonmagical ammunition is destroyed immediately after hitting the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and dealing any damage. Any nonmagical weapon takes a cumulative −1 penalty to attack rolls immediately after dealing damage to the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and coming into contact with it. The weapon is destroyed if the penalty reaches −5. The penalty can be removed by casting the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMending000]{Mending} spell on the weapon.

In 1 minute, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can eat through 2 feet of nonmagical wood or metal.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Attack Penalty active effect that will modify a targeted weapon. Since this penalty can be applied multiple times to multiple nonmagical weapons, this active effect needs to be dragged from this item's Effect tab onto the target Item's weapons.

mmCovenMagic0000.name: Coven Magic
mmCovenMagic0000.description: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]): @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplAugury0000]{Augury}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFindFamili]{Find Familiar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplIdentify00]{Identify}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLocateObje]{Locate Object}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplScrying000]{Scrying}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplUnseenServ]{Unseen Servant}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

mmCreateSpecter0.name: Create Specter
mmCreateSpecter0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets a Humanoid corpse within [[lookup @range.value activity=ypIQdXr13u7LATUP]] feet of itself that has been dead for no longer than 1 minute. The target's spirit rises as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmSpecter0000000]{Specter} in the space of its corpse or in the nearest unoccupied space. The specter is under the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s control. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have no more than seven specters under its control at a time.

mmCreateWhirlwin.name: Create Whirlwind
mmCreateWhirlwin.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] conjures a whirlwind at a point it can see within 120 feet. The whirlwind fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]]-foot-high [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] centered on that point. The whirlwind lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Concentration on it ends. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move the whirlwind up to 20 feet at the start of each of its turns.

Whenever the whirlwind enters a creature's space or a creature enters the whirlwind, that creature is subjected to the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TYNKL0QDItFpbR2G]] (a creature makes this save only once per turn, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is unaffected).

Failure: While in the whirlwind, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and moves with the whirlwind. At the start of each of its turns, the Restrained target takes [[/damage average]] damage. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

mmCrush000000000.name: Crush
mmCrush000000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] attaches to the target. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] had Advantage on the attack roll, it covers the target, which has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition and is &Reference[suffocating apply=false]{suffocating} while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is attached in this way.

While attached to a target, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can attack only the target but has Advantage on its attack rolls. Its Speed becomes 0, it can't benefit from any bonus to its Speed, and it moves with the target.

A creature can take an action to try to detach the [[lookup @name lowercase]] from itself, doing so with a successful [[/check format=long]]. On its turn, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can detach itself by using 5 feet of movement.

[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target's Strength score decreases by [[/r 1d4]]. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect in the Effects Tab to modify the target PC's Strength Score. Since this Strength reduction can be applied multiple times, the GM must drag the Active Effect in this item's Effect tab onto the PC's character sheet. From there, the GM must navigate to the Effects tab on the PC's sheet to modify the Effect Value preceded by the negative symbol, e.g., -3. Presently, it is set at -1.
