mmHammerThrow000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target is pushed up to 15 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has Disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

mmHarpoon0000000.name: Harpoon
mmHarpoon0000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls the target up to 15 feet straight toward itself.

mmHasten00000000.name: Hasten
mmHasten00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Dash] and &Reference[Disengage] actions.

mmHeartSight0000.name: Heart Sight
mmHeartSight0000.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=NqVrZShDV1L3zBA3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=NqVrZShDV1L3zBA3]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=NqVrZShDV1L3zBA3]] feet the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see (Celestials, Fiends, and Undead automatically fail the save).

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the target's emotions and alignment.

mmHeatAura000000.name: Heat Aura
mmHeatAura000000.description: At the end of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns, each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=LDcQJj3oXyPCuCaT]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=LDcQJj3oXyPCuCaT]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmHellfireSpellc.name: Hellfire Spellcasting
mmHellfireSpellc.description: The pit fiend casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFireball00]{Fireball} (level 5 version) twice, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]).. It can replace one Fireball with @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHoldMonste]{Hold Monster} (level 7 version) or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWallofFire]{Wall of Fire}.

mmHellishRestora.name: Hellish Restoration
mmHellishRestora.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies in the Nine Hells, it revives with all its Hit Points in [[/r 1d10]] days unless it is killed by a creature under the effects of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless} spell or its remains are sprinkled with Holy Water.

mmHoldBreath0000.name: Hold Breath
mmHoldBreath0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold its breath for {N} {Units}.

mmHolyBurst00000.name: Holy Burst
mmHolyBurst00000.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=HrgMO1rsQla47fff]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success: Half damage.

mmHorrificVisage.name: Horrific Visage
mmHorrificVisage.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=v8KiqUloIE5eocSu]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=v8KiqUloIE5eocSu]]-foot Cone that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and isn't an Undead. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Horrifying Visage for 24 hours.

mmHorrorNimbus00.name: Horror Nimbus
mmHorrorNimbus00.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=GP5MnIyXCVZ4ZMTQ]], until it takes damage, or until it ends its turn with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] out of line of sight.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Horror Nimbus for 24 hours.

mmHurlFlame00000.name: Hurl Flame
mmHurlFlame00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it starts burning.

mmIceSpear000000.name: Ice Spear
mmIceSpear000000.description:
[[/attack extended]].

Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. Until the end of its next turn, the target can't take a &Reference[Bonus Action] or &Reference[Reaction], its Speed decreases by 10 feet, and it can move or take one action on its turn, not both.

Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

mmIceWalk0000000.name: Ice Walk
mmIceWalk0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, &Reference[Difficult Terrain] composed of ice or snow doesn't cost it extra movement.

mmIceWall0000000.name: Ice Wall
mmIceWall0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWallofIce0]{Wall of Ice} (level 8 version), requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.int.dc]]).

mmIgnitedIllumin.name: Ignited Illumination
mmIgnitedIllumin.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sets itself ablaze or extinguishes its flames. While ablaze, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

mmIllumination00.name: Illumination
mmIllumination00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sheds Bright Light in a {m}-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional {n} feet.

mmIllusoryAppear.name: Illusory Appearance
mmIllusoryAppear.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self}, using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]). The spell's duration is [[lookup @duration.value activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=qY8e7Xm7QYQDXqsd]]s.

mmIncorporealMov.name: Incorporeal Movement
mmIncorporealMov.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can move through other creatures and objects as if they were &Reference[Difficult Terrain]. It takes [[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

mmIncubusForm000.name: Incubus Form
mmIncubusForm000.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into an @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmIncubus0000000]{Incubus}, using that stat block instead of this one.

mmInfernalGlaive.name: Infernal Glaive
mmInfernalGlaive.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature and doesn't already have an infernal wound, it is subjected to the following effect. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=4qy3fKL086OAE1xR]]. Failure: The target receives an infernal wound. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=IS4utGV80LpDrjvt]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after 1 minute, after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check format=long activity=KNWa0TFhANjmQCds]].

mmInfernalSting0.name: Infernal Sting
mmInfernalSting0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. While Poisoned, the target can't regain Hit Points.

mmInfernalTail00.name: Infernal Tail
mmInfernalTail00.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @range.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] damage, and the target receives an infernal wound if it doesn't have one. While wounded, the target loses [[/damage average activity=zZfCQ0IeJZCjPLzE]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. The wound closes after [[lookup @duration.value activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=tJYeyUk3iPYJq9xM]], after a spell restores Hit Points to the target, or after the target or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to stanch the wound, doing so by succeeding on a [[/check dc=17 ability=wis skill=med format=long]].

mmInkCloud000000.name: Ink Cloud
mmInkCloud000000.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes damage while underwater.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] releases ink that fills a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=1MiIPcVuCpfgBIkS]]-foot Cube centered on itself, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Swim Speed. The Cube is Heavily Obscured for 1 minute or until a strong current or similar effect disperses the ink.

mmInscrutable000.name: Inscrutable
mmInscrutable000.description: No magic can observe the [[lookup @name lowercase]] remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

mmInvisibility00.name: Invisibility
mmInvisibility00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

mmIronScent00000.name: Iron Scent
mmIronScent00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=I1ppxiVO5CS6tKj0]] within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=I1ppxiVO5CS6tKj0]] feet of itself.

mmJumper00000000.name: Jumper
mmJumper00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s jump distance is determined using its Dexterity rather than its Strength.

mmLash0000000000.name: Lash
mmLash0000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Tentacle attack.

mmLeap0000000000.name: Leap
mmLeap0000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] jumps up to [[lookup @range.value activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]] feet by [[lookup @activation.condition activity=C28C43DeD8iFtZMe]].

mmLegendaryResis.name: Legendary Resistance
mmLegendaryResis.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

mmLifeDrain00000.name: Life Drain
mmLifeDrain00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken.

mmLightSensitivi.name: Light Sensitivity
mmLightSensitivi.description: While in Bright Light, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on attack rolls.

mmLightningAbsor.name: Lightning Absorption
mmLightningAbsor.description: Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is subjected to Lightning damage, it regains a number of Hit Points equal to the Lightning damage dealt.

mmLightningBlade.name: Lightning Blade
mmLightningBlade.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target can't take &Reference[Reaction] until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmLightningBreat.name: Lightning Breath
mmLightningBreat.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]-foot-long, [[lookup @target.template.width activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]]-foot-wide [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=LpjgVwftzGNMgTUJ]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmLightningStorm.name: Lightning Storm
mmLightningStorm.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]]-foot-radius, [[lookup @target.template.height activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]]-feet-high Cylinder originating from a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=YVri6iuieFUUiO1d]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmLightningStrik.name: Lightning Strike
mmLightningStrik.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=v39JwGqgfaKiA4vc]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. Success:Half damage.

mmLimitedAmphibi.name: Limited Amphibiousness
mmLimitedAmphibi.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe air and water, but it must be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating outside water.

mmLoathsomeLimbs.name: Loathsome Limbs
mmLoathsomeLimbs.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] ends any turn Bloodied and took 15+ Slashing damage during that turn, one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]l's limbs is severed, falls into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space, and becomes a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmTrollLimb00000]{Troll Limb}. The limb acts immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level for each missing limb, and it grows replacement limbs the next time it regains Hit Points.

Foundry Note

This feature provides an Active Effect condition in the character sheet's Effects tab to enable each level of Exhaustion. Since the condition can be applied multiple times, the GM must manually manage the level of Exhaustion. There is an active effect available for each level of exhaustion.

mmLuringSong0000.name: Luring Song
mmLuringSong0000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] sings a magical melody, which lasts until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Concentration ends on it.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]], each [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=dxxqZP7Vo01te3QB]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] when the song starts.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the song ends and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns. While Charmed, the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and ignores the Luring Song of other harpies.

If the target is more than 5 feet from the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target moves on its turn toward the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by the most direct route, trying to get within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. It doesn't avoid &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]; however, before moving into damaging terrain (such as lava or a pit) and whenever it takes damage from a source other than the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the target repeats the save.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Luring Song for 24 hours.

mmMagicOfTheSpid.name: Magic of the Spider Queen
mmMagicOfTheSpid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDarkness00]{Darkness}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplFaerieFire]{Faerie Fire}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWeb0000000]{Web}, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

mmMagicResistanc.name: Magic Resistance
mmMagicResistanc.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

mmMagicRope00000.name: Magic Rope
mmMagicRope00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a magic rope. While bearing it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use the Entangling Rope action. The rope has AC 20, HP 90, and Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage. The rope turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points, if it is 5+ feet away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour or more, or if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. If the rope is damaged or destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can fully restore it when finishing a Short or Long Rest.

mmMimicry0000000.name: Mimicry
mmMimicry0000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can mimic simple sounds it has heard, such as a whisper or chitter. A hearer can discern the sounds are imitations with a successful [[/check format=long]].

mmMindInvasion00.name: Mind Invasion
mmMindInvasion00.description: The dragon uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMindSpike0]{Mind Spike} (level 3 version).

mmMindJolt000000.name: Mind Jolt
mmMindJolt000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMindSpike0]{Mind Spike} (level 4 version). The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmMindrendingRoa.name: Mind-Rending Roar
mmMindrendingRoa.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=zPMfwwIoTFzIrN5H]]. Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmMistyEscape000.name: Misty Escape
mmMistyEscape000.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can't use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed.

While it has 0 Hit Points in mist form, it can't return to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until it regains any Hit Points, and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

mmMistyStep00000.name: Misty Step
mmMistyStep00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMistyStep0]{Misty Step}, requiring no spell components and using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmMoan0000000000.name: Moan
mmMoan0000000000.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=Mng39fcFDc4I1AzY]]. Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Moan for the next 24 hours.

mmMockery0000000.name: Mockery
mmMockery0000000.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=s5CMus4LOXBkt1Wn]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=s5CMus4LOXBkt1Wn]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=s5CMus4LOXBkt1Wn]] feet. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

mmMucusCloud0000.name: Mucus Cloud
mmMucusCloud0000.description:
While underwater, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is surrounded by mucus.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=clFFG8uDBSFzxIo8]] Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turn. Failure: The target is cursed. Until the curse ends, the target's skin becomes slimy, the target can breathe air and water, and it can't regain Hit Points unless it is underwater.

While the cursed creature is outside a body of water, the creature takes [[/damage average activity=JrxCVyCOsBAMVZS7]] damage at the end of every 10 minutes unless moisture is applied to its skin before those minutes have passed.

mmMultiattack000.name: Multiattacco
mmMultiattack000.description: Il [[lookup @name lowercase]] effettua {count} attacchi con [[/item]] e usa [[/item]].

mmMultipleHeads0.name: Multiple Heads
mmMultipleHeads0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has five heads. Whenever the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 25 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns when it has at least one living head, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn, unless it has taken Fire damage since its last turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains 20 Hit Points when it grows new heads.

mmNecroticStrike.name: Necrotic Strike
mmNecroticStrike.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Rotting Fist or Channel Negative Energy attack.

mmNightmare00000.name: Nightmare
mmNightmare00000.description: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] feet. Failure: If the target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Y9H9ImnMcffBZlH3]], until it takes damage, or until a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it. Otherwise, the target takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmNightmareHaunt.name: Nightmare Haunting
mmNightmareHaunt.description:
While on the Ethereal Plane, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDream00000]{Dream}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. Only the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can serve as the spell's messenger, and the target must be a [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=4GGGVhvLSrHgHdb9]]. The spell fails and is wasted if the target is under the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbEvilAndGoodPr]{Protection from Evil and Good} spell or within a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicCircl]{Magic Circle} spell.

If the target takes damage from the Dream spell, the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to that damage. If the spell kills the target, its soul is trapped in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s soul bag, and the target can't be raised from the dead until its soul is released.

mmNightmareRay00.name: Nightmare Ray
mmNightmareRay00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmNimbleEscape00.name: Nimble Escape
mmNimbleEscape00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Disengage] or &Reference[Hide] action.

mmNoxiousMiasma0.name: Noxious Miasma
mmNoxiousMiasma0.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Blm8nddvCOH69bL8]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target takes a −2 penalty to AC until the end of its next turn.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmOceanSpear0000.name: Ocean Spear
mmOceanSpear0000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, its Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of its next turn. Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

mmOnslaught00000.name: Onslaught
mmOnslaught00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Claw or Tail attack.

mmOozeCube000000.name: Ooze Cube
mmOozeCube000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] fills its entire space and is transparent. Other creatures can enter that space, but a creature that does so is subjected to the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Engulf and has Disadvantage on the saving throw.

Creatures inside the [[lookup @name lowercase]] have &Reference[Total Cover], and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can hold one Large creature or up to four Medium or Small creatures inside itself at a time.

As an action, a creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]] [[lookup @range.units activity=EcTOfXWsDJRHLydy]]. of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature or an object out of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] by succeeding on a [[/check dc=12 ability=str skill=ath format=long]], and the puller takes [[/damage average activity=PMCvyqxfUYiPzNK8]] damage.

mmPackTactics000.name: Pack Tactics
mmPackTactics000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the Incapacitated condition.

mmParalyzingBrea.name: Paralyzing Breath
mmParalyzingBrea.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=r4MGqEq5U9aaseBh]]-foot Cone.

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, when it repeats the save.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

mmParalyzingTent.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
mmParalyzingTent.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=p157Iqz8s0M0VilW]], it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

mmParalyzingTouc.name: Paralyzing Touch
mmParalyzingTouc.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmParry000000000.name: Parry
mmParry000000000.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is [[lookup @activation.condition activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds [[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]] to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

mmPetrifyingBite.name: Petrifying Bite
mmPetrifyingBite.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=udF9lrpAQMvL0b9J]].

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

mmPetrifyingBrea.name: Petrifying Breath
mmPetrifyingBrea.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=reU3RXAk0MdPmKCl]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=reU3RXAk0MdPmKCl]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=reU3RXAk0MdPmKCl]]-foot Cone.

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

mmPetrifyingGaze.name: Petrifying Gaze
mmPetrifyingGaze.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]]. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] sees its reflection in the [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=mN9aF1WkHQWLIN4B]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must make this save.

First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

mmPhantasms00000.name: Phantasms
mmPhantasms00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMirrorImag]{Mirror Image} spell, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability. The spell ends early if the [[lookup @name lowercase]] starts or ends its turn in Bright Light.

mmPincer00000000.name: Pincer
mmPincer00000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of two pincers.

mmPoisonBreath00.name: Poison Breath
mmPoisonBreath00.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]]-foot [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=lnabW9bM51HoluPp]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmPoisonousSpitt.name: Poisonous Spittle
mmPoisonousSpitt.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=r4plP8QiJxzFZZO7]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=r4plP8QiJxzFZZO7]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=r4plP8QiJxzFZZO7]] feet. Failure: 31 (7d8) Poison damage, and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Success: Half damage only.

mmPossession0000.name: Possession
mmPossession0000.description:
Charisma Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=7gmNBVjwuYTyANMe]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=7gmNBVjwuYTyANMe]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=7gmNBVjwuYTyANMe]] feet.

Failure: The target is possessed by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]; the [[lookup @name lowercase]] disappears, and the target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition and loses control of its body. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] now controls the body, but the target retains awareness. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, except ones that specifically target Undead. The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s game statistics are the same, except it uses the possessed target's Speed, as well as the target's Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution modifiers.

The possession lasts until the body drops to 0 Hit Points or the [[lookup @name lowercase]] leaves as a Bonus Action. When the possession ends, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the target, and the target is immune to this ghost's Possession for 24 hours.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Possession for 24 hours.

mmPounce00000000.name: Pounce
mmPounce00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one [[/item Rend]] attack.

mmProbingTelepat.name: Probing Telepathy
mmProbingTelepat.description: If a creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see communicates telepathically with the [[lookup @name lowercase]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] learns the creature's greatest desires.

mmProboscis00000.name: Proboscis
mmProboscis00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, its Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken.

mmProtection0000.name: Protection
mmProtection0000.description:
Trigger: An attack roll hits the wearer of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s amulet while the wearer is within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Response: The wearer gains a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack and possibly causing it to miss, until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmProtectiveMagi.name: Protective Magic
mmProtectiveMagi.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCounterspe]{Counterspell} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplShield0000]{Shield} in response to the spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmProwl000000000.name: Prowl (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
mmProwl000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks]. At the end of this movement, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take the &Reference[Hide apply=false] action.

mmPsychicDrain00.name: Psychic Drain
mmPsychicDrain00.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has at least one creature Charmed or Grappled, it uses Consume Memories and regains [[/healing average]].

mmPummel00000000.name: Pummel
mmPummel00000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=aae828c0Hue0XOMP]], one creature Grappled by the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmPursuit0000000.name: Pursuit
mmPursuit0000000.description: Trigger: Another creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see ends its move within [[lookup @range.value activity=blUXkjLhs9kD2ofo]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Teleport, but its destination space must be [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=blUXkjLhs9kD2ofo]].

mmQuickGrapple00.name: Quick Grapple
mmQuickGrapple00.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=aDWVHpJgsNPPNrDs]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=aDWVHpJgsNPPNrDs]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=aDWVHpJgsNPPNrDs]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=aDWVHpJgsNPPNrDs]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Grappled] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]).

mmRadiantTelepor.name: Radiant Teleport
mmRadiantTelepor.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=HtsFBK1PYKjvy9mn]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=HtsFBK1PYKjvy9mn]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=HtsFBK1PYKjvy9mn]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] at its destination space.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmRam00000000000.name: Ram
mmRam00000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=z58sUDUmqxECJgT3]] creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmRampage0000000.name: Rampage
mmRampage0000000.description: Immediately after dealing damage to a creature that is already &Reference[Bloodied], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one {action} attack.

mmReactive000000.name: Reactive
mmReactive000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can take one &Reference[Reaction] on every turn of combat.

mmReactiveHeads0.name: Reactive Heads
mmReactiveHeads0.description: For each head the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has beyond one, it gets an extra &Reference[Reaction] that can be used only for &Reference[OpportunityAttacks].

mmReadThoughts00.name: Read Thoughts
mmReadThoughts00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]).

mmRedirectAttack.name: Redirect Attack
mmRedirectAttack.description:
Trigger: A creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see makes an attack roll against it.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] chooses [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=pIlCmuPw8YUqAISY]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=pIlCmuPw8YUqAISY]] feet of itself. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and that [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=pIlCmuPw8YUqAISY]] swap places, and the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=pIlCmuPw8YUqAISY]] becomes the target of the attack instead.

mmReel0000000000.name: Reel
mmReel0000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] pulls [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=jWkEQYHBd7aht1kG]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=jWkEQYHBd7aht1kG]] feet of itself that is Restrained by its Web Strand up to 25 feet straight toward itself.

mmReflectiveCara.name: Reflective Carapace
mmReflectiveCara.description:
If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile} spell or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll [[/r 1d6]].

On a 1–5, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is unaffected.

On a 6, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is unaffected and reflects the spell, turning the caster into the target.

mmReflexiveAnten.name: Reflexive Antennae
mmReflexiveAnten.description: Trigger: An attack roll hits the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Antennae.

mmRegeneration00.name: Regeneration
mmRegeneration00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] regains [[lookup @healing.formula activity=5cGvjZJIJVicjJ3d]] Hit Points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 Hit Point.

mmRepulsionBreat.name: Repulsion Breath
mmRepulsionBreat.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=zuf9EEVj4nI1joaH]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=zuf9EEVj4nI1joaH]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=zuf9EEVj4nI1joaH]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target is pushed up to 30 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmRestlessTouch0.name: Restless Touch
mmRestlessTouch0.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target is cursed for 24 hours or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies. Until the curse ends, the target gains no benefit from finishing Short Rests.

mmRiposte0000000.name: Riposte
mmRiposte0000000.description:
Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon.

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. On a miss, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one Rapier attack against the triggering creature if within range.

Foundry Note

This feature also provides an Active Effect (AE) that will modify this creature's Armor Class when you utilize the reaction. You can enable the AE in the effects tab of the character sheet.

mmRoar0000000000.name: Roar
mmRoar0000000000.description:
The sphinx emits a magical roar. Whenever it roars, the roar has a different effect, as detailed below (the sequence resets when it takes a Long Rest):

First Roar. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]], each enemy in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=Igeu89TALGlNPXDg]].

Second Roar. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=uFTndQPvULZVHT9R]], it succeeds automatically.

Third Roar. Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=Td8ArIMDfxWDLbE9]] damage only.

mmRockLaunch0000.name: Rock Launch
mmRockLaunch0000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmRottingFist000.name: Rotting Fist
mmRottingFist000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can't regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum doesn't return to normal when finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by [[/r 3d6#HP Max Decrease]]{10 (3d6)} every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

mmRunningLeap000.name: Running Leap
mmRunningLeap000.description: With a 10-foot running start, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can Long Jump up to 25 feet.

mmScare000000000.name: Scare
mmScare000000000.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=L6pjs2RafI3pF8b3]], one creature within [[lookup @range.value activity=L6pjs2RafI3pF8b3]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

mmScorchingSands.name: Scorching Sands
mmScorchingSands.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=g5fxAWhrpwohtETl]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=g5fxAWhrpwohtETl]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=g5fxAWhrpwohtETl]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target's Speed is halved until the end of its next turn.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmSenseMagic0000.name: Sense Magic
mmSenseMagic0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] senses magic within 120 feet of itself. This trait otherwise works like the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic} spell but isn't itself magical.

mmShadowStealth0.name: Shadow Stealth
mmShadowStealth0.description: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes the &Reference[Hide] action.

mmShapeshift0000.name: Shape-Shift
mmShapeshift0000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] shape-shifts into a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=EU2q25V5hIaM1ZlR]], or it returns to its true humanoid form, or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

mmSharkTelepathy.name: Shark Telepathy
mmSharkTelepathy.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can magically control sharks within 120 feet of itself, using a special telepathy.

mmShieldBash0000.name: Shield Bash
mmShieldBash0000.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]] [[lookup @range.units activity=eIErvLccVVCXiCSl]]. that the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmShieldedMind00.name: Shielded Mind
mmShieldedMind00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s thoughts can't be read by any means, and other creatures can communicate with it telepathically only if it allows them.

mmShimmeringShie.name: Shimmering Shield
mmShimmeringShie.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] targets itself or one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] it can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=sl8NoPhB0e5z6jmK]] feet of itself. The target gains [[/healing average temp]], and its AC increases by 2 until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s' next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmShriek00000000.name: Shriek
mmShriek00000000.description: Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] or a source of Bright Light moves within [[lookup @range.value activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] emits a shriek audible within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] feet of itself for [[lookup @duration.value activity=Tlv3gcYk5KfdtV7c]] minute or until the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies.

mmSiegeMonster00.name: Siege Monster
mmSiegeMonster00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] deals double damage to objects and structures.

mmSlayingBow0000.name: Slaying Bow
mmSlayingBow0000.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] [[lookup @range.units activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]]. Failure: If the [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=C7BMf8hIfCjxRSWC]] has 100 Hit Points or fewer, it dies. It otherwise takes [[/damage average]] damage.

mmSleep000000000.name: Sleep
mmSleep000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSleep00000] spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]).

mmSleepBreath000.name: Sleep Breath
mmSleepBreath000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=6ce9oevQRWomSVSF]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn, at which point it repeats the save.

Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=EZma0lCmQeTuVuAL]] minute. This effect ends for the target if it takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

mmSlow0000000000.name: Slow
mmSlow0000000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSlow000000]{Slow} spell, requiring no spell components and using Constitution as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17).

mmSlowingBreath0.name: Slowing Breath
mmSlowingBreath0.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=teMMQNDDIE9XkPN3]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target can't take Reactions; its Speed is halved; and it can take either an action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

mmSmother0000000.name: Smother
mmSmother0000000.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can give it the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) instead of dealing damage. Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, is &Reference[Suffocating]{suffocating}, and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns. [[lookup @name lowercase]] rug can smother only one creature at a time.

While grappling the target, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

mmSonicBoom00000.name: Sonic Boom
mmSonicBoom00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] uses Spellcasting to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplShatter000]{Shatter}. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmSoulBag0000000.name: Soul Bag
mmSoulBag0000000.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a soul bag. While holding or carrying the bag, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can use its Nightmare Haunting action.

The bag has AC 15, HP 20, and Resistance to all damage. The bag turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points. If the bag is destroyed, any souls the bag is holding are released. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can create a new bag after 7 days.

mmSpeakWithBeast.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
mmSpeakWithBeast.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

mmSpellStoring00.name: Spell Storing
mmSpellStoring00.description: A spellcaster who wears the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s amulet can cause the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to store one spell of level 4 or lower. To do so, the wearer must cast the spell on the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while within 5 feet of it. The spell has no effect but is stored within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Any previously stored spell is lost when a new spell is stored. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast the spell stored with any parameters set by the original caster, requiring no spell components and using the caster's spellcasting ability. The stored spell is then lost.

mmSpellcasting00.name: Incantesimi
mmSpellcasting00.description:
Il [[lookup @name lowercase]] lancia uno dei seguenti incantesimi, senza richiedere componenti {type} e usando {ability} come caratteristica da incantatore (CD del tiro salvezza contro incantesimi [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]):

A volontà: {spell}

{count}/giorno ciascuno: {spell}

mmSpiderClimb000.name: Spider Climb
mmSpiderClimb000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

mmSpiritJar00000.name: Spirit Jar
mmSpiritJar00000.description: If destroyed, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] reforms in [[/r 1d10]] days if it has a spirit jar, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s lair.

mmSpiritualWeapo.name: Spiritual Weapon
mmSpiritualWeapo.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]{Spiritual Weapon} spell, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmSplit000000000.name: Split
mmSplit000000000.description:
Trigger: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] [[lookup @activation.condition activity=zoXFSgzmWq8frUjI]]

Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] splits into two new [[lookup @name capitalize]]. Each new [[lookup @name lowercase]] is one size smaller than the original [[lookup @name lowercase]] and acts on its Initiative. The original [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Hit Points are divided evenly between the new [[lookup @name lowercase]]s (round down).

mmSpores00000000.name: Spores
mmSpores00000000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=voqQeTnihpy3BTFf]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=voqQeTnihpy3BTFf]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. While Poisoned, the target takes [[/damage average activity=ukZveNVmvvtwbDj0]] at the start of each of its turns. Emptying a flask of Holy Water on the target ends the effect early.

mmStandingLeap00.name: Standing Leap
mmStandingLeap00.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Long Jump is up to 20 feet and its High Jump is up to 10 feet with or without a running start.

mmSteamBreath000.name: Steam Breath
mmSteamBreath000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=5iI1KQRWrdMGh9sy]]-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: Being underwater doesn't grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

mmStench00000000.name: Stench
mmStench00000000.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]], any creature (other than a [[lookup @name lowercase]]) that starts its turn in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=mJbwhj3beOIB3Jgj]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn. Success: The target is immune to the Stench of all [[lookup @name lowercase]] for 1 hour.

mmStormBolt00000.name: Storm Bolt
mmStormBolt00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmStunningScreec.name: Stunning Screech
mmStunningScreec.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=eoIikvnPayaj02oN]], each creature in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=eoIikvnPayaj02oN]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (demons succeed automatically).

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmSuccubusForm00.name: Succubus Form
mmSuccubusForm00.description: When the [[lookup @name lowercase]] finishes a Long Rest, it can shape-shift into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmSuccubus000000]{Succubus}, using that stat block instead of this one. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

mmSunlightSensit.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
mmSunlightSensit.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

mmSunlightWeakne.name: Sunlight Weakness
mmSunlightWeakne.description: While in sunlight, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has Disadvantage on D20 Tests.

mmSwallow0000000.name: Swallow
mmSwallow0000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=YorssyWMumAsvzx3]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]] (the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can have only one creature swallowed at a time).

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] swallows the target, which is no longer Grappled. While swallowed, a creature has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has &Reference[Total Cover] against attacks and other effects outside the [[lookup @name lowercase]], and takes [[/damage average activity=zrWNjO9mkbN28spL]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls in a space within [[lookup @range.value activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]] [[lookup @range.units activity=rGeGukkm2t2fXsoy]]. of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] dies, a swallowed creature is no longer Restrained and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

mmSwarm000000000.name: Swarm
mmSwarm000000000.description: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a {creature size and type}. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

mmSwarmOfGraspin.name: Swarm of Grasping Hands
mmSwarmOfGraspin.description: [[/attack extended activity=rO8NirkWF6w9GXTc]]. [[/damage average extended activity=rO8NirkWF6w9GXTc]], or [[/damage average activity=hzeHzcSKHC4AvIJQ]] damage if the swarm is &Reference[Bloodied apply=false]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmSwoop000000000.name: Swoop
mmSwoop000000000.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a creature Grappled, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] flies up to half its Fly Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and drops that creature.

mmTail0000000000.name: Tail
mmTail0000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a {size} or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmTailSwipe00000.name: Tail Swipe
mmTailSwipe00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes one [[/item Rend]] attack.

mmTelepathicBond.name: Telepathic Bond
mmTelepathicBond.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is on the same plane of existence as its master, the two of them can communicate telepathically with each other.

mmTeleport000000.name: Teleport
mmTeleport000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=dnoRMdFzhUUku26D]] feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

mmTentacle000000.name: Tentacle
mmTentacle000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a {size} or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from one of {count} tentacles.

mmTentacleSlam00.name: Tentacle Slam
mmTentacleSlam00.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=VC2iSwNPNaZ7M2bT]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=VC2iSwNPNaZ7M2bT]] by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. Success: Half damage only.

mmTentacles00000.name: Tentacles
mmTentacles00000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]) from all four tentacles.

mmThunderbolt000.name: Thunderbolt
mmThunderbolt000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Deafened apply=false] conditions until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmThunderclap000.name: Thunderclap
mmThunderclap000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]]-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Lq6GexegvlEVB6Dh]] feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Deafened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

mmThunderousBell.name: Thunderous Bellow
mmThunderousBell.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]], [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=RWBqtTjGSlEgQWCl]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Deafened apply=false] and &Reference[Frightened apply=false] conditions until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

mmTouch000000000.name: Touch
mmTouch000000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a creature or a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it starts burning.

mmToxicInk000000.name: Toxic Ink
mmToxicInk000000.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=Kquf9zADg0jtKBqw]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] while it is underwater.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] conditions until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] then moves up to its Speed.

Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmTraining000000.name: Training
mmTraining000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has proficiency in one skill of the DM's choice and has Advantage whenever it makes an ability check using that skill.

mmTrample0000000.name: Trample
mmTrample0000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=QckCIpsC3BdEHycI]], [[lookup @target.affects.labels.statblock activity=QckCIpsC3BdEHycI]] within [[lookup @range.value activity=QckCIpsC3BdEHycI]] feet that has the Prone condition.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

mmTramplingCharg.name: Trampling Charge
mmTramplingCharg.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed without provoking &Reference[OpportunityAttacks] and can move through the spaces of [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=FG9rAj3Q8UTxbGLF]]. Each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=FG9rAj3Q8UTxbGLF]] whose space the [[lookup @name lowercase]] enters is targeted once by the following effect.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=FG9rAj3Q8UTxbGLF]].

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmTransparent000.name: Transparent
mmTransparent000.description: Even when the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is in plain sight, a creature must succeed on a [[/check dc=15 ability=wis skill=prc format=long]] to notice the [[lookup @name lowercase]] if the creature hasn't witnessed the [[lookup @name lowercase]] move or otherwise act.

mmTrashLob000000.name: Trash Lob
mmTrashLob000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

mmTreasureSense0.name: Treasure Sense
mmTreasureSense0.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pinpoint the location of precious metals and stones within 60 feet of itself.

mmTreeClub000000.name: Tree Club
mmTreeClub000000.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

mmTreeStride0000.name: Tree Stride
mmTreeStride0000.description: If within [[lookup @range.value activity=8av8Lh1jNLCrOJny]] feet of a [[lookup @range.special activity=8av8Lh1jNLCrOJny]], the [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports to an unoccupied space within [[lookup @range.value activity=8av8Lh1jNLCrOJny]] feet of a second [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=8av8Lh1jNLCrOJny]] that is within 60 feet of the previous tree.

mmTrollSpawn0000.name: Troll Spawn
mmTrollSpawn0000.description: The limb uncannily has the same senses as a whole [[lookup @name lowercase]]. If the limb isn't destroyed within 24 hours, roll [[/r 1d12#On a 12, the limb turns into a troll]]{roll 1d12}. On a 12, the limb turns into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.actors24.Actor.mmTroll000000000]{Troll}. Otherwise, the limb withers away.

mmTunneler000000.name: Tunneler
mmTunneler000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow Speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

mmUmbralDagger00.name: Umbral Dagger
mmUmbralDagger00.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]. If the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack, the target becomes Stable but has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition for 1 hour. While it has the Poisoned condition, the target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition.

mmUndeadFortitud.name: Undead Fortitude
mmUndeadFortitud.description: If damage reduces the [[lookup @name lowercase]] to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

mmUndeadRestorat.name: Undead Restoration
mmUndeadRestorat.description: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed before it atones for its evil, it gains a new body in [[/r 1d10]] days, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in a location significant to the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

mmUnicornsBlessi.name: Unicorn's Blessing
mmUnicornsBlessi.description: The [[lookup @name]] touches another creature with its horn and casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCureWounds]{Cure Wounds} or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration} on that creature, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

mmUnnervingGaze0.name: Unnerving Gaze
mmUnnervingGaze0.description:
Trigger: A [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see starts its turn within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]], the triggering [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=btp6NZvx465nxWTF]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Unnerving Gaze for 24 hours.

mmUnsettlingVisa.name: Unsettling Visage
mmUnsettlingVisa.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]] in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]]-foot Emanation originating from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] that can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]], it succeeds automatically.

mmVampireWeaknes.name: Vampire Weakness
mmVampireWeaknes.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has these weaknesses:

Forbiddance. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant.

Running Water. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.

Stake to the Heart. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s heart while the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has the Incapacitated condition.

Sunlight. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

mmVampiricConnec.name: Vampiric Connection
mmVampiricConnec.description: While the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its vampire master are on the same plane of existence, the vampire can communicate with the [[lookup @name lowercase]] telepathically, and the vampire can perceive through the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s senses.

mmVanish00000000.name: Vanish
mmVanish00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] and its light have the &Reference[Invisible apply=false] condition until the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s &Reference[Concentration] ends on this effect, which ends early immediately after the [[lookup @name lowercase]] makes an attack roll or uses Consume Life.

mmVileAppearance.name: Vile Appearance
mmVileAppearance.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]], any [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]] that starts its turn within [[lookup @range.value activity=FR0ETDHBas1Z5LfF]] feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and can see the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s true form.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to this [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Horrific Appearance for 24 hours.

mmVortex00000000.name: Vortex
mmVortex00000000.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]], one [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space. Failure: [[/damage average activity=cZy0VYbCVY8aRB4z]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target can't cast spells with a Verbal component and takes [[/damage average activity=kDz92inkRCjGrPiz]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns.

mmWarCry00000000.name: War Cry
mmWarCry00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] or one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=uN0VTW2Fqig7YAs9]] of its choice that can see or hear it gains [[/healing average temp]] and has Advantage on attack rolls until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmWaterBreathing.name: Water Breathing
mmWaterBreathing.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can breathe only underwater. It can hold its breath for {duration} outside water.

mmWaterForm00000.name: Water Form
mmWaterForm00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without expending extra movement to do so.

mmWaterSusceptib.name: Water Susceptibility
mmWaterSusceptib.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] takes 3 (1d6) Cold damage damage for every 5 feet the [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves in water or for every gallon of water splashed on it.

Foundry Note

Scaling is configured to roll the correct number of dice based on the distance traveled through water. 1 is default for 5 feet, 2 is for 10 feet, and so forth.

mmWeakeningBreat.name: Weakening Breath
mmWeakeningBreat.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EGZ4bS4HpJkfNG9s]], each creature that isn't currently affected by this breath in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=EGZ4bS4HpJkfNG9s]]-foot Cone.

Failure: The target has Disadvantage on Strength-based D20 Tests and subtracts 3 ([[/r 1d6]]) from its damage rolls. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=EGZ4bS4HpJkfNG9s]] minute, it succeeds automatically.

mmWeb00000000000.name: Web
mmWeb00000000000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=6iMoUgxwYlvfKTXr]], one creature the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=6iMoUgxwYlvfKTXr]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage).

mmWebStrand00000.name: Web Strand
mmWebStrand00000.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=Ln5NXBaHGKlwdoiP]], one Large or smaller [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=Ln5NXBaHGKlwdoiP]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=Ln5NXBaHGKlwdoiP]] feet.

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage).

mmWebWalker00000.name: Web Walker
mmWebWalker00000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] ignores movement restrictions caused by webs, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows the location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

mmWeightOfYears0.name: Weight of Years
mmWeightOfYears0.description: Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]], one [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]] the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can see within [[lookup @range.value activity=xZul1ImCP658OBv3]] feet. Failure: The target gains 1 &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level. While the target has any Exhaustion levels, it appears [[/r 3d10]] years older. Failure or Success: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

mmWhelm000000000.name: Whelm
mmWhelm000000000.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, is &Reference[suffocating]{suffocating} unless it can breathe water, and takes [[/damage average activity=khxVwH3AB0sx1qRG]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at a time with Whelm.

As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature out of it by succeeding on a [[/check ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]].

Success: Half damage only.

mmWhirlwind00000.name: Whirlwind
mmWhirlwind00000.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=GQzr4EMMm6kkZVdC]], each Medium or smaller [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=GQzr4EMMm6kkZVdC]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space. Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the [[lookup @name lowercase]] and has the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. Success: Half damage only.

mmWhirlwindOfSan.name: Whirlwind of Sand
mmWhirlwindOfSan.description: Trigger: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] is hit by an attack roll. Response: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] adds 2 to its AC against the attack, possibly causing the attack to miss, and the [[lookup @name lowercase]] teleports up to [[lookup @range.value activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]] [[lookup @range.units activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. Each creature of its choice that it can see within [[lookup @target.template.size activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=EsBmMUQMO4b0g6Yw]]. of its destination space has the &Reference[Blinded apply=false] condition until the end of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

mmWishes00000000.name: Wishes
mmWishes00000000.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] has a [[/r 1d100cs<31#Knows Wish on 1]]{30 percent} chance of knowing the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWish000000]{Wish} spell. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] knows it, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can cast it only on behalf of a non-genie creature who communicates a wish in a way the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can understand. If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts the spell for the creature, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] suffers none of the spell's stress. Once the [[lookup @name lowercase]] has cast it three times, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't do so again for 365 days.

mmWorldshakingMo.name: World-Shaking Movement
mmWorldshakingMo.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves up to its Speed. At the end of this movement, the [[lookup @name lowercase]] creates an instantaneous shock wave in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=g4W0ovZxBeUrZKb8]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=g4W0ovZxBeUrZKb8]]. Emanation originating from itself. Creatures in that area lose &Reference[Concentration] and, if Medium or smaller, have the &Reference[Prone apply=false] condition. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.
